title: An Act concerning equitable allocation of recovery proceeds for subrogation claims

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Roy of Franklin, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1966) of Jeffrey N. Roy relative to equitable allocation of recovery proceeds for certain subrogation claims.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
